article.title: Leadership in prototyping
article.author: Josh Miller
article.excerpt: Test early and often to reduce risks and bring ideas into the world faster.

authors.bio: Joshua Miller is a UI/UX designer currently prototyping and researching new digital experiences with the USA TODAY Network's Storytelling Studio.
